document.full_text: the federal reserve should keep interest rates on hold for some time after it completes its bond buying to assess its impact on the economy, st. louis fed president james bullard said on friday.
document.title: bullard says fed should wait and see after qe2
lines_and_colors: the federal reserve should keep interest rates on hold for some time after it completes its bond buying to assess its impact on the economy, st. louis fed president james bullard said on friday.
